text: Jisuna mangonda hairak-i, “Eingonda paiganu maramdi eihak houjik phaoba Ipagi maphamda kakhattri. Adubu nahakna eigi ichin inaosingda chattuna makhoida hairu, ‘Eina eigi Ipa Ibungo amadi nakhoigi Napa Ibungo aduga eigi Tengban Mapu amadi nakhoigi Tengban Mapu oiriba Ibungo mahakki manakta hallagani.’ ”
